def rule_code_block(source_value, target_value):
    """
    Checks for the email address of the customer based on the source field - customer_email and target field - email.
    Ignores spaces and case when matching.
    """
    if not source_value or not target_value:
        return False
    # Remove all spaces and compare lowercase
    s = str(source_value).replace(' ', '').lower()
    t = str(target_value).replace(' ', '').lower()
    return s == t
